name: nasa-space-explorer
description: NASA Space Explorer - Full-stack web application showcasing NASA's space data

scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install

scripts.format:all: cd frontend && npm run format && cd ../backend && npm run format
